mapper.select: SELECT t_user.c_id, t_user.c_loginid, t_user.c_password, t_user.c_name, t_user.n_flag FROM t_user WHERE t_user.c_loginid = #{loginid} AND t_user.c_password = #{password}
select t_user.c_id, t_user.c_loginid, t_user.c_password, t_user.c_name, t_user.n_flag from t_user LIMIT #{page},#{index}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (c_loginid, c_password, c_name, n_flag) VALUES( #{CLoginId}, #{CPassWord}, #{CName}, #{NFlag} )
mapper.update: update t_user set c_loginid=#{CLoginId}, c_password=#{CPassWord}, c_name=#{CName}, n_flag=#{NFlag} where c_id=#{CId}
mapper.select: SELECT c_id, c_loginid, c_password, c_name, n_flag from t_user where c_id=#{cid}
